snippet: Mariupol was on the front lines of separatist battles just months ago, but the conflict has been at a low simmer, creating an odd normalcy in the port city.
abstract: Mariupol Journal; residents of Mariupol, Ukraine, industrial port city on Sea of Azov, have eased back into everyday life; calm is occasionally punctuated by sounds of shelling on city's outskirts, distant reminder of deadly January rocket attack that put city in panic; fears that Russian-backed separatists could attempt again to capture city have eased, but weary residents say tension remains.
lead_paragraph: Mariupol was on the front lines of separatist battles just months ago, but the conflict has been at a low simmer, creating an odd normalcy in the port city.

headline.print_headline: Sounds of War Recede in City Once at Center of Conflict
headline.main: Sounds of War Recede to Background in an Eastern Ukraine City
